name: CreateSsisFolderTask
description: Create a folder in an SSIS instance
author: Dr. John Tunnicliffe

inputs.name: Folder
inputs.label: Name of SSIS folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the SSIS folder to be created

inputs.name: FolderDescription
inputs.label: Description of SSIS folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the SSIS folder to be created

inputs.name: Server
inputs.label: Server name or IP address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Server name or IP address.  Include the database instance name and port if necessary (e.g. myserver\myinstance,myport)

inputs.name: Database
inputs.label: Name of SSIS database (usually SSISDB)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of SSIS database (usually SSISDB), but can be renamed by pedantic DBAs
